classifiers: Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows NT/2000
info.description:
webGobbler wanders the web, downloads random images and mixes them in a
collage-like picture. The image evolves slowly as new images are added.
Various effects can be applied (emboss, negative, mirror...).
The program can be used as a simple image generator, webpage generator (with
auto-refresh), screensaver (for Windows and Gnome/KDE), wallpaper changer, etc.
Can be used in command-line mode or in GUI mode.
Binary (with installer) is provided for Win32. Source distribution for other OSes.
info.name: webgobbler
info.summary: Downloads random images from the web and mixes them.
info.html_description: webGobbler wanders the web, downloads random images and mixes them in a collage-like picture. The image evolves slowly as new images are added. Various effects can be applied (emboss, negative, mirror…). The program can be used as a simple image generator, webpage generator (with auto-refresh), screensaver (for Windows and Gnome/KDE), wallpaper changer, etc. Can be used in command-line mode or in GUI mode. Binary (with installer) is provided for Win32. Source distribution for other OSes.
